item.title: Answered!
item.dc:creator: @wanttobecoders wanttobecoders
item.description:
@wanttobecoders wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:2, topic:370108”][code]

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("pickup") && c.playerRights >= 2) {
			try {
				String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
				if (args.length == 3) {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
					if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
						c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);		
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("No such item.");
					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("Use as ::pickup 995 200");
				}
			} catch(Exception e) {
				
			}
		}

[/code][/quote]

he want for PI

if (playerCommand.startsWith("pickup")) { if (c.inWild()) { return; } try { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); if (args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); System.out.println("Spawned: " + newItemID + " by: " + c.playerName); } else { c.sendMessage("No such item."); } } else { c.sendMessage("Use as ::pickup 995 200"); }

add to the playerRight 2 section on command.java

Read full topic

item.title: Answered!
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:


			if (playerCommand.startsWith("pickup") && c.playerRights >= 2) {
				try {
					String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
					if (args.length == 3) {
						int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
						int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
						if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
							c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);		
						} else {
							c.sendMessage("No such item.");
						}
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("Use as ::pickup 995 200");
					}
				} catch(Exception e) {
					
				}
			}
